alert.note: Alert for Modoc County Except for the Surprise Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 25 at 4:51AM PDT until August 26 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY WIND AND LOW RH FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 285... The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * Impacts: Strong, gusty wind with low relative humidity and critically dry vegetation will greatly increase the spread potential of any new and existing fires. * Affected area...In northern California, portions of Fire Zone 285, including Alturas, Canby, Likely, Adin, and portions of the Modoc National Forest. * Wind...West to southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Humidity...8 to 10 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Modoc County Except for the Surprise Valley
